//LED blinks to indicate Platform is spinning or other diagnostic

leds.diagnostic = E.2;

//ESP Settings

8266wifi.espResetPin = A.4;
//ESP RX/TX Settings
8266wifi.serialRxTxPins = { D.9, D.8 } ;
serial.aux.rxTxPins = {NoPin, NoPin};


//TMC Smart Drivers
stepper.numSmartDrivers = 4;

// External Display settings
